trans-unit.source: This is meant to be a canonical post for questions about this warning message.
trans-unit.target: 这旨在成为有关此警告消息问题的规范帖子。

trans-unit.source: A DispatcherServlet is just a typical Java EE Servlet. You register it with your typical <web.xml><servlet-class> and <servlet-mapping> declaration, or directly through ServletContext#addServlet in a WebApplicationInitializer, or with whatever mechanism Spring boot uses. As such, you must rely on the url mapping logic specified in the Servlet specification, see Chapter 12. See also
trans-unit.target: 一个 DispatcherServlet 的仅仅是一个典型的Java EE Servlet 。您注册它典型的 <web.xml> <servlet-class> 和 <servlet-mapping> 申报，也可以直接通过 ServletContext#addServlet 在 WebApplicationInitializer ，或与任何机构弹簧开机使用。因此，您必须依赖Servlet规范中指定的url映射逻辑，请参阅第12章。另请参见

trans-unit.source: After I analyzed for 2 to 4 days I found out the root cause. Class files was not generated after I run the project. I clicked the project tab.
trans-unit.target: 经过我分析了2到4天,我找到了根本原因。我运行项目后,类文件没有生成。我点击了工程选项卡。

trans-unit.source: After trying a lot of different things, I tried removing the @EnableWebMvc and it worked!
trans-unit.target: 在尝试了许多不同的事情之后，我尝试删除了 @EnableWebMvc ，它起作用了！

trans-unit.source: And my web page is loading again.
trans-unit.target: 而我的网页又开始加载了。

trans-unit.source: Annotate your @Configuration class with @EnableWebMvc.
trans-unit.target: 用 @EnableWebMvc 注释您的 @Configuration 类。

trans-unit.source: Apparently in my case at least, I'm already configuring my Spring application (although not by using web.xml or any other static file, it's definitely programmatically), so it was a conflict there.
trans-unit.target: 显然，至少就我而言，我已经在配置Spring应用程序（尽管没有使用 web.xml 或任何其他静态文件，但肯定是通过编程方式进行的），因此这是一个冲突。

trans-unit.source: Arguably the most important, beans of type HandlerMapping map
trans-unit.target: 可以说是最重要的，类型豆 HandlerMapping 地图

trans-unit.source: As the link above describes, both of these will register a RequestMappingHandlerMapping bean (and a bunch of other stuff). However, a HandlerMapping isn't very useful without a handler. RequestMappingHandlerMapping expects some @Controller beans so you need to declare those too, through @Bean methods in a Java configuration or <bean> declarations in an XML configuration or through component scanning of @Controller annotated classes in either. Make sure these beans are present.
trans-unit.target: 正如上面的链接所描述的，这两个都将注册一个 RequestMappingHandlerMapping bean（以及其他一些东西）。但是，如果没有处理程序，则 HandlerMapping 并不是很有用。 RequestMappingHandlerMapping 需要一些 @Controller Bean，因此您也需要通过Java配置中的 @Bean 方法或XML配置中的 <bean> 声明，或通过对其中一个带有 @Controller 注释类的组件进行扫描来声明它们。确保这些豆存在。

trans-unit.source: Because the DispatcherServlet is mapped to /* and /* matches everything (except exact matches, which have higher priority), the DispatcherServlet would be chosen to handle the forward from the JstlView (returned by the InternalResourceViewResolver). In almost every case, the DispatcherServlet will not be configured to handle such a request.
trans-unit.target: 因为 DispatcherServlet 的被映射到 /* 和 /* 匹配一切（除了精确匹配，其具有更高的优先级），则 DispatcherServlet 的将被选择来处理 forward 从 JstlView （由返回 InternalResourceViewResolver ）。几乎在每种情况下， DispatcherServlet 都不会配置为处理此类请求。

trans-unit.source: Class files for source code have been generated. It solved my problem. To check whether class files have been generated or not, Please check the Build folder in your project folder.
trans-unit.target: 源代码的类文件已经生成了。它解决了我的问题。要检查类文件是否已经生成,请检查项目文件夹中的Build文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Clean your server. Maybe delete the server and add the project once again and Run.
trans-unit.target: 清洁你的服务器。也许删除服务器,然后再一次添加项目并运行。

trans-unit.source: Debugging
trans-unit.target: Debugging

trans-unit.source: Declare a <mvc:annotation-driven /> member in your XML configuration.
trans-unit.target: 在您的XML配置中声明一个 <mvc:annotation-driven /> 成员。

trans-unit.source: Edit: Here's the reference documentation that says you should remove the @EnableWebMvc annotation
trans-unit.target: 编辑：这是参考文档，说您应该删除 @EnableWebMvc 批注

trans-unit.source: Finally, I have a @Controller in the package com.example.controllers
trans-unit.target: 最后，我在 com.example.controllers 包中有一个 @Controller

trans-unit.source: For me, I found that my target classes were generated in a folder pattern not same as source. This is possibly in eclipse I add folders for containing my controllers and not add them as packages. So I ended up defining incorrect path in spring config.
trans-unit.target: 对我来说,我发现我的目标类是以文件夹模式生成的,和源码不一样。这可能是在eclipse中,我添加文件夹是为了包含控制器而不是作为包添加。所以我最终在spring config中定义了不正确的路径。

trans-unit.source: How are Servlet url mappings in web.xml used?
trans-unit.target: 如何在web.xml中使用Servlet的url映射?

trans-unit.source: I added packages (not folders) for com.happy.app and moved the files from folders to packages in eclipse and it resolved the issue.
trans-unit.target: 我为com.happy.app添加了包(而不是文件夹),并在eclipse中将文件从文件夹中移动到包中,这个问题就解决了。

trans-unit.source: I came across another reason for the same error. This could also be due to the class files not generated for your controller.java file. As a result of which the the dispatcher servlet mentioned in web.xml is unable to map it to the appropriate method in the controller class.
trans-unit.target: 我遇到了另一个同样的错误原因。这也可能是由于你的controller.java文件中的类文件没有生成。结果是web.xml中提到的dispatcher servlet无法将其映射到控制器类中的相应方法。

trans-unit.source: I had same problem as **No mapping found for HTTP request with URI [/some/path] in DispatcherServlet with name SomeName**
trans-unit.target: 我的问题与 **No mapping found for HTTP request with URI [/some/path] in DispatcherServlet with name SomeName**

trans-unit.source: I have a JSP resource at /WEB-INF/jsps/index.jsp I expected Spring MVC to use my controller to handle the request and forward to the JSP, so why is it responding with a 404?
trans-unit.target: 我在 /WEB-INF/jsps/index.jsp 有一个JSP资源，我希望Spring MVC使用我的控制器来处理请求并转发给JSP，所以为什么它用404响应？

trans-unit.source: I resolved my issue when in addition to described before:`
trans-unit.target: 我解决了我的问题,除了之前描述的:`。

trans-unit.source: I'm writing a Spring MVC application deployed on Tomcat. See the following minimal, complete, and verifiable example
trans-unit.target: 我正在编写部署在Tomcat上的Spring MVC应用程序。请参阅以下最小，完整和可验证的示例

trans-unit.source: INFO: Mapped "{[/home/index],methods=[GET]}" onto public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView com.lionheart.fourthed.controller.WebController.gotoIndex()
trans-unit.target: INFO:将"{[[homeindex],methods=[GET]}"映射到 public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView com.lionheart.fourthed.controller.WebController.gotoIndex()

trans-unit.source: If you don't implicitly or explicitly register any HandlerMapping beans (or if detectAllHandlerMappings is true), the DispatcherServlet registers some defaults. These are defined in DispatcherServlet.properties in the same package as the DispatcherServlet class. They are BeanNameUrlHandlerMapping and DefaultAnnotationHandlerMapping (which is similar to RequestMappingHandlerMapping but deprecated).
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有隐式或显式注册任何 HandlerMapping Bean（或者 detectAllHandlerMappings 为 true ），则 DispatcherServlet 会注册一些默认值。这些是在 DispatcherServlet.properties 中与 DispatcherServlet 类相同的包中定义的。它们是 BeanNameUrlHandlerMapping 和 DefaultAnnotationHandlerMapping （类似于 RequestMappingHandlerMapping ,但已弃用）。

trans-unit.source: If you're getting the warning message and a 404 and you've configured all of the above correctly, then you're sending your request to the wrong URI, one that isn't handled by a detected @RequestMapping annotated handler method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到警告消息和404，并且已正确配置上述所有内容，那么您会将请求发送到错误的URI，而该URI未被检测到的 @RequestMapping 注释处理程序方法处理。

trans-unit.source: In eclipse under Project->select clean ->Build Project.Do give a check if the class file has been generated for the controller file under builds in your workspace.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">在Eclipse中的Project->选择clean-> Build Project下。检查工作区中builds下是否为控制器文件生成了类文件。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: In my case, I was following the Interceptors Spring documentation for version 5.1.2 (while using Spring Boot v2.0.4.RELEASE) and the WebConfig class had the annotation @EnableWebMvc, which seemed to be conflicting with something else in my application that was preventing my static assets from being resolved correctly (i.e. no CSS or JS files were being returned to the client).
trans-unit.target: 就我而言，我遵循的是Interceptors Spring文档5.1.2版（使用Spring Boot v2.0.4.RELEASE时），并且 WebConfig 类具有注释 @EnableWebMvc ，这似乎与我的应用程序中的其他内容冲突阻止我的静态资产得到正确解决（即没有CSS或JS文件返回给客户端）。

trans-unit.source: In my case, I was playing around with import of secondary java config files into a main java config file. While making secondary config files, I had changed the name of the main config class, but I had failed to update the name in web.xml. So, every time that I had restarted my tomcat server, I was not seeing mapping handlers noted in the Eclipse IDE console, and when I tried to navigate to my home page I was seeing this error:
trans-unit.target: 在我的案例中,我在玩弄将次要的java配置文件导入到主java配置文件中。在制作辅助配置文件时,我改变了主配置文件类的名称,但我没有更新web.xml中的名称。因此,每次重启tomcat服务器时,我都没有在Eclipse IDE控制台中注意到映射处理程序,当我试图导航到我的主页时,我看到这个错误。

trans-unit.source: Instead, in this simplistic case, you should register the DispatcherServlet to /, marking it as the default servlet. The default servlet is the last match for a request. This will allow your typical servlet container to chose an internal Servlet implementation, mapped to *.jsp, to handle the JSP resource (for example, Tomcat has JspServlet), before trying with the default servlet.
trans-unit.target: 相反，在这种简单的情况下，应该将 DispatcherServlet 注册到 / ，将其标记为默认servlet。默认servlet是请求的最后一个匹配项。这将允许您的典型Servlet容器在尝试使用默认Servlet之前，选择一个内部Servlet实现（映射到 *.jsp ）来处理JSP资源（例如，Tomcat具有 JspServlet ）。

trans-unit.target: 我的应用程序的上下文名称为 Example 。当我发送请求给

trans-unit.target: 我的目标类是在app下生成类,我的目标类是指com.happy.app。

trans-unit.target: 在名称为SomeName的 DispatcherServlet 中找不到带有URI [/some/path] 的 HTTP请求的映射

trans-unit.target: 2019年11月1日 11:00:01 PM org.springframework.web.servlet.PageNotFound noHandlerFound警告:在DispatcherServlet中没有找到名称为'dispatcher'的HTTP请求的URI [webapphomeindex]的映射

trans-unit.source: Now I am seeing the mapping in the console window:
trans-unit.target: 现在我在控制台窗口中看到了映射。

trans-unit.source: Other HandlerMapping implementations log their own statements that should hint to their mappings and their corresponding handlers.
trans-unit.target: 其他 HandlerMapping 实现记录他们自己的语句，这些语句应提示它们的映射和相应的处理程序。

trans-unit.target: 其他常见的错误

trans-unit.source: Right click server again and select "Clean Tomcat Work Directory"
trans-unit.target: 再次右击服务器,选择 "清洁Tomcat工作目录"

trans-unit.source: Right click the server and select "Clean"
trans-unit.target: 右键点击服务器,选择 "清洁"

trans-unit.source: Similarly, enable Spring logging at DEBUG level to see which beans Spring registers. It should report which annotated classes it finds, which packages it scans, and which beans it initializes. If the ones you expected aren't present, then review your ApplicationContext configuration.
trans-unit.target: 同样，在DEBUG级别启用Spring日志记录以查看Spring注册了哪些bean。它应该报告找到的带注释的类，扫描的包以及初始化的bean。如果没有您所期望的，请查看您的 ApplicationContext 配置。

trans-unit.source: Spring MVC will log handlers registered through RequestMappingHandlerMapping. For example, a @Controller like
trans-unit.target: Spring MVC将记录通过 RequestMappingHandlerMapping 注册的处理程序。例如， @Controller 类的

trans-unit.source: Stop the Tomcat server
trans-unit.target: 停止Tomcat服务器

trans-unit.source: That's what you're seeing in your example.
trans-unit.target: 这就是你所看到的例子。

trans-unit.source: The javadoc of HandlerMapping further describes how implementations must behave.
trans-unit.target: HandlerMapping 的javadoc进一步描述了实现必须如何表现。

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherServlet finds all beans of this type and registers them in some order (can be customized). While serving a request, the DispatcherServlet loops through these HandlerMapping objects and tests each of them with getHandler to find one that can handle the incoming request, represented as the standard HttpServletRequest. As of 4.3.x, if it doesn't find any, it logs the warning that you see
trans-unit.target: 在 DispatcherServlet 的发现这种类型的所有豆类和以某种顺序将它们登记（可定制）。在处理请求时， DispatcherServlet 循环遍历这些 HandlerMapping 对象，并使用 getHandler 测试每个对象，以找到可以处理传入请求的对象，表示为标准 HttpServletRequest 。从4.3.x版本开始，如果找不到任何内容，它将记录您看到的警告

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherServlet looks at its ApplicationContext and, if available, the ApplicationContext registered with a ContextLoaderListener for special beans it needs to setup its request serving logic. These beans are described in the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 在 DispatcherServlet 的外观在它 ApplicationContext ，如果可用， ApplicationContext 中，注册 ContextLoaderListener 的特殊豆需要设置其请求服务的逻辑。这些bean在文档中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: The spring-webmvc library offers other built-in HandlerMapping implementations. For example, BeanNameUrlHandlerMapping maps
trans-unit.target: 该 spring-webmvc 库提供其他内置 HandlerMapping 实现。例如， BeanNameUrlHandlerMapping 映射

trans-unit.source: The fix was to update the web.xml file so that the old name "WebConfig" would be instead "MainConfig", simply renaming it to reflect the latest name of the main java config file (where "MainConfig" is arbitrary and the words "Web" and "Main" used here are not a syntax requirement). MainConfig was important, because it was the file that did the component scan for "WebController", my spring mvc controller class that handles my web requests.
trans-unit.target: 修复的方法是更新web.xml文件,将旧的名称 "WebConfig "改为 "MainConfig",只需将其重命名为反映主java配置文件的最新名称(这里的 "MainConfig "是任意的,这里使用的 "Web "和 "Main "不是语法要求)。MainConfig很重要,因为就是这个文件对 "WebController "进行了组件扫描,我的spring mvc控制器类处理我的web请求。

trans-unit.source: The most common HandlerMapping implementation is RequestMappingHandlerMapping, which handles registering @Controller beans as handlers (really their @RequestMapping annotated methods). You can either declare a bean of this type yourself (with @Bean or <bean> or other mechanism) or you can use the built-in options. These are:
trans-unit.target: 最常见的 HandlerMapping 实现是 RequestMappingHandlerMapping ，它将 @Controller bean 注册为处理程序（实际上是 @RequestMapping 注释方法）。您可以自己声明这种类型的bean（使用 @Bean 或 <bean> 或其他机制），也可以使用内置选项。这些是：

trans-unit.source: This describes the mapping registered. When you see the warning that no handler was found, compare the URI in the message to the mapping listed here. All the restrictions specified in the @RequestMapping must match for Spring MVC to select the handler.
trans-unit.target: 这描述了注册的映射。当您看到未找到任何处理程序的警告时，请将消息中的URI与此处列出的映射进行比较。 @RequestMapping 中指定的所有限制必须匹配，Spring MVC才能选择处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Why didn't the DispatcherServlet find a HandlerMapping that could handle my request?
trans-unit.target: 为什么 DispatcherServlet 没有找到可以处理我的请求的 HandlerMapping ？

trans-unit.source: Why does Spring MVC respond with a 404 and report “No mapping found for HTTP request with URI […] in DispatcherServlet”
trans-unit.target: 为什么Spring MVC以404响应并报告 "在DispatcherServlet中没有找到具有URI [...]的HTTP请求的映射"?

trans-unit.source: With that in mind, a common mistake is to register the DispatcherServlet with a url mapping of /*, returning a view name from a @RequestMapping handler method, and expecting a JSP to be rendered. For example, consider a handler method like
trans-unit.target: 考虑到这一点，一个常见的错误是使用 /* 的URL映射注册 DispatcherServlet ，从 @RequestMapping 处理程序方法返回视图名称，并期望呈现JSP。例如，考虑一个类似的处理程序方法

trans-unit.source: Your standard Spring MVC application will serve all requests through a DispatcherServlet that you've registered with your Servlet container.
trans-unit.target: 您的标准Spring MVC应用程序将通过已在Servlet容器中注册的 DispatcherServlet 满足所有请求。

trans-unit.source: ` from: JSP file not rendering in Spring Boot web application
trans-unit.target: 来自：Spring Boot Web应用程序中未呈现的JSP文件

trans-unit.source: and either throws a NoHandlerFoundException or immediately commits the response with a 404 Not Found status code.
trans-unit.target: 和任一抛出一个 NoHandlerFoundException 或立即提交一个404 Not Found状态码的响应。

trans-unit.source: and you can always write your own. Obviously, you'll have to make sure the request you're sending matches at least one of the registered HandlerMapping object's handlers.
trans-unit.target: 而且您总是可以自己编写。显然，您必须确保要发送的请求至少与已注册的 HandlerMapping 对象的处理程序之一匹配。

trans-unit.source: from URLs to beans with names that start with a slash ("/")
trans-unit.target: 从URL到名称以斜线("")开头的豆子

trans-unit.source: incoming requests to handlers and a list of pre- and post-processors (handler interceptors) based on some criteria the details of which vary by HandlerMapping implementation. The most popular implementation supports annotated controllers but other implementations exists as well.
trans-unit.target: 根据某些条件向处理程序传入的请求以及一系列预处理程序和后处理程序（处理程序拦截器），这些标准的细节因 HandlerMapping 实现而异。最流行的实现支持带注释的控制器，但也存在其他实现。

trans-unit.source: you might expect the request to be forwarded to a JSP resource at the path /WEB-INF/jsps/example-view-name.jsp. This won't happen. Instead, assuming a context name of Example, the DisaptcherServlet will report
